page.title: 06My day at Wroxall School.
page.content: I left my house at 8.30,played until "intime",then read "Zozu the Robot".We fed the rabbit,collected the dinner numbers and rang through to Ventnor central kitchens.From 9.45 I did weighing for maths.At 10.45 we went out to play and I skipped. At 11.00 I wrote about Mr.W.who went to our school in 1920,for our Domesday Project.At 12.00 we went to lunch,I had sandwiches,a chocolate biscuit some crisps and a blackcurrant drink. I cleared the plates and tables,then I went out to play and skipped. In the afternoon we had to draw shapes to see if they tesselate (circles and pentagons don't but squares and triangles do).At playtime I skipped again then I showed the school the water turbine I made out of a plastic bottle.At 3.00 I walked home.
